content: - 15 single_crochet around 24 single_crochet fasten_off leave a 20 cm 8 in tail of mc fuschia for seaming repeat repeat process to create second leg stuff stuff the body firmly through the neck opening lightly stuff the narrow part of each leg through the foot opening seam seam between each leg and foot this encloses the stuffing in the leg and creates an open suction cup style of foot head begin at top of head ensure the chosen side of the work is facing outwards to match the body start with 5 mm hook us 8 use mc fushia and the crazy yarn to make an amr round 1 chain 1 6 single_crochet into ring tighten tail 6 single_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet in each st 12 single_crochet round 3 * 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet repeat from * around 18 single_crochet round 4 * 2 single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet repeat from * around 24 single_crochet round 5 single_crochet around 24 single_crochet round 6 * 2 single_crochet in next st 3 single_crochet repeat from * around 30 single_crochet rounds 7 12 single_crochet around 30 single_crochet round 13 * 3 single_crochet invdec repeat from * around 24 single_crochet round 14 single_crochet around 24 single_crochet stuff stuff the head with polyfill and continue to stuff while working round 15 * 2 single_crochet invdec repeat from * around 18 single_crochet round 16 * single_crochet invdec repeat from * around 12 single_crochet round 17 invdec in each st 6 single_crochet fasten_off leave a 20 cm 8 in tail of mc fuschia for seaming finish off add a little more stuffing if needed use the tail of the yarn to run a gathering stitch through the front loops of the final round tighten to close the head repeat for a secure finish attach position the head on top of the body ensure the toy maintains good balance stitch securely in place add stuffing to the neck for firm support eyes stitch two buttons in an offset unbalanced position for eyes inner beast - by sharon maher of laughing purple goldfish designs ©2017 horns make 2 the horns are worked from the tip to the base with a single strand of dk and the smaller hook work in spirals do not join the rounds use your stitch marker to keep track of the beginning of each round start with 3 mm hook us c or d use white yarn to make an amr round 1 chain 1 6 single_crochet into ring tighten tail 6 single_crochet rounds 2 4 single_crochet around 6 single_crochet round 5 2 single_crochet in first st single_crochet to end 7 single_crochet repeat repeat round 5 a further 5 times - 12 single_crochet round 11 * 2 single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet repeat from * around 16 single_crochet rounds 12 15 single_crochet around 16 single_crochet fasten_off leave a 20 cm 8 in tail for attaching stuff stuff each horn firmly encourage the shape to bend towards the tip repeat
